name: "DooM2 Deathmatch 4-Pack" 4PACK.WAD (DM24PK.ZIP)
description: Previous DOOM levels: "Training Facility" DMTRAIN.WAD These levels were designed for deathmatch play. No monsters. Deathmatch 2.0 (-altdeath) rules are recommended. Features open play areas, rooms for hiding, and elevated perches for long distance spotting/shooting. See special notes below.
